localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 38 days in a row, down 54% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/TabonANL9m
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已经连续38天下降，比1月6日的峰值下降了54%。🙏 https://t.co/TabonANL9m
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已經連續38天下降，比1月6日的峯值下降了54%。🙏 https://t.co/TabonANL9m

previous.excerpt: We scrapped the Likes, feed, and spammy messages to finally bring aligned professionals together meaningfully. 600+ tech leaders meet regularly through hand-curated introductions and Office Hours over video to accelerate their progress.
previous.title: Kinetic - Meet co-founders, mentors, advisors, investors, & customers

localize.description: 我们取消了点赞、馈赠和垃圾信息，终于把对齐的专业人士有意义地聚集在一起。600+技术领袖通过精心策划的介绍和视频办公时间定期会面，加速他们的进步。
localize.tagline: 与联合创始人、导师、顾问、投资人和客户见面。

localize.description: 我們取消了點贊、饋贈和垃圾信息，終於把對齊的專業人士有意義地聚集在一起。600+技術領袖通過精心策劃的介紹和視頻辦公時間定期會面，加速他們的進步。
localize.tagline: 與聯合創始人、導師、顧問、投資人和客戶見面。

next.title:
Bitcoin hits $57,000 for the first time, nearly doubling since the start of the year.

A week ago it was at $47,000.
A month ago it was at $34,000.
A year ago it was at $9,000.

$BTC https://t.co/EScLC3yv1l

localize.full_text:
比特币首次达到57000美元，自年初以来几乎翻了一番。

一周前，它的价格是47000美元。
一个月前，它是在34000美元。
一年前，它是在9000美元。

$BTC https://t.co/EScLC3yv1l

比特幣首次達到57000美元，自年初以來幾乎翻了一番。

一週前，它的價格是47000美元。
一個月前，它是在34000美元。
一年前，它是在9000美元。

$BTC https://t.co/EScLC3yv1l
